content:
# Światowy Dzień Inżyniera 2024

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/swiatowy-dzien-inzyniera-2024/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:39:55

World Engineering Day 2024
2024.03.05, 08h00 – 11h00, AGH University 
UNESCO AGH Chair Seminar 
UNESCO World Engineering Day: Engineering Solutions for Sustainable  Development. 

The seminar is focusing on the role and importance of engineers in  applying and promoting the UN Sustainable Development Goals and good  practices. Representatives of 15 countries will take part in the  seminar: Benin, Cuba, Ethiopia, India, Ivory Coast, Kenya, Namibia,  Nigeria, Pakistan, Peru, Sri Lanka, Syria, Tanzania, Uzbekistan, Zambia.
